inclusions: 03 Night accommodation at Kathmandu on 5 Star Hotel – Hotel Aloft / Hotel Dusit

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Arrival (1400m) - Overnight in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Your Arrival Time – Airport pickup and transfer to your Hotel. Original passport and photograph collection for Chinese visa processing.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: 08:00 AM – After Breakfast – Full day sightseeing of Pashupatinath Temple, ShaktiPeeth and Budhanilkantha.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu- Lhasa Flight
itinerary.description: After Breakfast: Drive to Kathmandu airport. Take a Morning flight to Lhasa. (1 hrs 15 m). Arrive at Lhasa Gonggar Airport. Upon arrival you will be welcomed with White Khada and transfer to the Hotel. Along the way, you can enjoy the spectacular scenery of Yarlung Tsangpo River, Lhasa River, and the typical Tibetan villages.

itinerary.title: Lhasa Sightseeing: Visit Potala Palace, Jokhang Temple and Barkhor Street
itinerary.description:
Guide will take you to the stunning Potala Palace, from top you can gaze down upon views of Lhasa. The enormous building contains a tiny world inside. Nestled at the base of the Potala Palace, Longwangtan Park awaits you. Enjoy traditional Tibetan cultural experiences and a unique viewpoint of the magnificent Potala Palace from this serene location.
You will travel to the revered Jokhang Temple in the afternoon. Located in the heart of Lhasa’s old town, the Jokhang Temple was built in the seventh century. The temple’s circumference, Barkhor Street, is a fantastic location for souvenir shopping.

itinerary.title: Lhasa – Ali or Purang Flight. And Drive to Mansarovar (4550m)
itinerary.description: Transfer to Airport to fly out to Ali Gunsa Airport or Purang Airport (4,500 m) (2 hrs flight). Pick up from the airport, drive to Mansarovar lake crossing beautiful places and stay at the shore of the Lake. Fill spiritual water. Parikrama of Mansarovar Lake by vehicle (3 hrs – 90 km). Perform Puja (prayer ritual) at Mansarovar Lake.

itinerary.title: First Day of Outer Kora - Trek to Dirapuk (4860m)
itinerary.description: 10:00 AM – After a short drive, we will reach Tarboche and visit Yama Dwar. This is the starting point for Kora. We will trek to Dirapuk (4860 m) which is a 12 km trek (5-6 hrs). You will visit the North face of Mt. Kailash. Travelers who do not want to trek around (Parikrama) Kailash can go back to Darchen and wait for the rest of the group to arrive from Parikrama.
itinerary.meals: Breakfast at Darchen, Packed Lunch, Dinner

itinerary.title: Second Day of Outer Kora - On to Zuthulphuk (4670m) with Trek via Dolma La Pass
itinerary.description: 07:00AM – Trek from Dirapuk to Dolma La Pass and proceed to Zuthulphuk (22 km trek for 8-9 hours trek). The first stage of the trip is a two-hour ascent to Dolma La Pass (5700 m | 18700 ft). The trail brings us past Yamasthal on our way to Shiva-sthal, with each step bringing us closer to the Dolma-La Pass. There are some tea shops before you reach Dolma La Pass where you can have tea and hot refreshments. After Dolma La Pass, the route descends for an hour before straightening out for 2-3 hours till we reach Zuthulphuk. You’ll be able to see Gauri Kunda (The Pond of Goddess Parvati) as well while descending from Dolma la pass.

itinerary.title: Third day of Outer Kora. Kora ends. Drive to Purang or Ali
itinerary.description: 08:00AM – After a short Trek (8kms – 2 – 3hrs) and reach the point where the coach will be waiting, we will drive to Darchen and merge with other members who were waiting and drive to Ali or Purang.

itinerary.title: Flight to Lhasa
itinerary.description: Transfer to Airport and fly to Lhasa. Rest at Lhasa & free day for Shopping.

itinerary.title: Fly from Lhasa to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Fly to Kathmandu airport from Lhasa and transfer to a hotel.
itinerary.accommodation: 5 Star Hotel – Hotel Aloft / Hotel Dusit Princess or similar

itinerary.title: Transfer to Kathmandu Airport
itinerary.description: You will be free till your flight time. We will drop you at the Airport 2 hours before flight time (30 mins drive).
